abstract bool CanReset [get]
 Gets a value indicating whether the random number generator can be reset, so that it produces the same random number sequence again.

Detailed Description

Declares common functionality for all random number generators.

Member Function Documentation

abstract int MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.RandomSource.Next (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a nonnegative random number less than Int32.MaxValue.

Returns:
A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to 0, and less than Int32.MaxValue; that is, the range of return values includes 0 but not Int32.MaxValue .

Implemented in MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, and MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource.

abstract int MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.RandomSource.Next ( int  maxValue  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.

Parameters:
maxValue The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to 0.
Returns:
A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to 0, and less than maxValue ; that is, the range of return values includes 0 but not maxValue .

Implemented in MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, and MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource.

int  maxValue 
) [pure virtual]

Returns a random number within the specified range.

Parameters:
minValue The inclusive lower bound of the random number to be generated.
maxValue The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue .
Returns:
A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue , and less than maxValue ; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue .

abstract bool MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.RandomSource.NextBoolean (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a random Boolean value.

Buffers 31 random bits for future calls, so the random number generator is only invoked once in every 31 calls.

Returns:
A Boolean value.

Implemented in MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, and MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource.

abstract void MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.RandomSource.NextBytes ( byte[]  buffer  )  [pure virtual]

Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.

Each element of the array of bytes is set to a random number greater than or equal to 0, and less than or equal to Byte.MaxValue.

Parameters:
buffer An array of bytes to contain random numbers.

Implemented in MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.AdditiveLaggedFibonacciRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.MersenneTwisterRandomSource, MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.SystemRandomSource, and MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.XorShiftRandomSource.

Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.

Each element of the array of bytes is set to a random number greater than or equal to 0, and less than or equal to Byte.MaxValue.

abstract double MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.RandomSource.NextDouble (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a nonnegative floating point random number less than 1.0.

Returns:
A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0; that is, the range of return values includes 0.0 but not 1.0.

Implements MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.IContinuousGenerator.

abstract double MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources.RandomSource.NextDouble ( double  minValue,
double  maxValue 
) [pure virtual]

Returns a floating point random number within the specified range.

Parameters:
minValue The inclusive lower bound of the random number to be generated. The range between minValue and maxValue must be less than or equal to Double.MaxValue
maxValue The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue . The range between minValue and maxValue must be less than or equal to Double.MaxValue.
Returns:
A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to minValue , and less than maxValue ; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue .

abstract bool MathNet::Numerics::RandomSources.RandomSource::CanReset [get]

Gets a value indicating whether the random number generator can be reset, so that it produces the same random number sequence again.

Implements MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.IContinuousGenerator.
